name: BHVR Game
description:
The game is a racing game with 'instant on/off', and features different vehicles and vehicles tracks. You can get a taste of it here.
The vehicle and track feature are based on the original cars from 1994-1996. The city-driving areas in the game will be based on "Hanasaki city" (Hindi for 'Horns') and "Yokohama prefecture". The game is part of the "I Am a Hero" project by Outhouse Media. Outhouse Media is the French-funded gaming company that started from crowdfunding in 1999 and designs and publishes games to be published by publishers in Europe and North America. Advertisement They have released six games until now. And obviously, the Italian game "Hukou: Badland" was one of the first to get the crowdfunding seal of approval. Outhouse Media also released a racing game called "Demo Racer 5" in 2011 as well as a game called "Boku Box" for the PlayStation 3 and Playstation Vita. Source: Outhouse Media
